resources.string:
Kremala is a letter quizz game to find a word among categories that user can select. 

 Kremala is a multiplayer game. 
Switch to next player by tapping Switch player in the play game screen. 

 Kremalas point system. 
 For every random word generated, points equal to lettersXletter points, are assigned. Each letter is granted initial points,can be adjusted, using the settings tap in the play game screen. 
Every good guess do not alter word points 
 Each wrong guess subtracts subsequent letter points, initially set. 
 The number of same letter that can be found within word can also be adjusted using the settings tap. 
 Maximum allowed wrong guesses are set to 5. 

 Kremala is a time clocking game 
 Time passed since tapping to the first letter of a word, is also a point system factor. 
Each word has initial time left = lettersXletter points seconds/10 . 
 Every wrong guess deducts letter points in seconds/10 from the word score. 

 Word count stops
 When word is found, or time is lost, or attempts exchausted. 

 Score 
 Your ten best scores will automatically be saved into the High Scores. 

 Good Luck!
